# Ignore files and folders generated by the Android build system
build/
.gradle/
local.properties
.DS_Store # Mac specific
Thumbs.db # Windows specific
*.iml
*.apk
*.aab
*.aar
captures/
.externalNativeBuild/
.cxx/

# Ignore Android Studio generated files
.idea/
# Add specific .idea files you might want to keep if necessary,
# but usually ignoring the whole directory is fine.
# .idea/workspace.xml
# .idea/libraries/

# Generated files
# These might be generated by annotation processors, data binding, etc.
# The 'build/' directory often covers these, but specific entries can be added
# if generated files appear elsewhere and shouldn't be committed.

# Crashlytics and other tool specific files
crashlytics-build.properties
fabric/

# Ignore Gradle wrapper (optional, but standard practice to include)
# Uncomment the next two lines if you DO want to ignore the wrapper
# gradlew
# gradlew.bat

# Ignore gradlew folder (optional, but standard practice to include)
# Uncomment the next line if you DO want to ignore the gradlew folder
# gradle/wrapper/

# Keep the gradlew scripts and wrapper files (RECOMMENDED)
!gradlew
!gradlew.bat
!gradle/wrapper/

# Distribution archives
*.zip

# Files for the ARM simulator
# *.ipa

# Files specific to testing or debugging
*.jks # Keystore files (unless it's a dummy test key)

# Lint results
lint-results.html
lint-results.xml

# Temporary files
*.swp
*~
.*.swp
.lock

# Add any other files or directories specific to your project that should be ignored
# For example, if you store large data files or secrets locally
# secrets.properties
# data/
